scenes.description: Static event poster for "Pleiades" Ninomae Ina'nis 2024 Live.
Cinematic intro: A celestial music box opens in the void of space, revealing a world of stars and constellations. English narration sets the stage.
Ninomae Ina'nis performs the song 'U' on a celestial stage with constellation motifs and stylized on-screen lyrics.

subtitles.original: Suspended in the void between stars,
subtitles.english: Suspended in the void between stars,

subtitles.original: a celestial music box twists open.
subtitles.english: a celestial music box twists open.

subtitles.original: Within, seven points of light
subtitles.english: Within, seven points of light

subtitles.original: await their moment to shine.
subtitles.english: await their moment to shine.

subtitles.original: Now that the time has come, as they awaken,
subtitles.english: Now that the time has come, as they awaken,

subtitles.original: their ethereal melody echoes out into the cosmos.
subtitles.english: their ethereal melody echoes out into the cosmos.

subtitles.original: When those notes fall upon your ears,
subtitles.english: When those notes fall upon your ears,

subtitles.original: where will they take you?
subtitles.english: where will they take you?

subtitles.original: Listen well...
subtitles.english: Listen well...

subtitles.original: destiny beckons.
subtitles.english: destiny beckons.

subtitles.original: ララライ ララライ
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai,

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない名も無い今を駆け抜けるの
subtitles.english: running through this nameless present no one knows

subtitles.original: あの三日月に手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reach out your hand toward that crescent moon

subtitles.original: ララライ ララライ
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai,

subtitles.original: 君を知りたい声にならない臆病な朝を
subtitles.english: wanting to know you in this silent, timid morning

subtitles.original: たとえ何度迎えようとも
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I face it

subtitles.original: 臍の緒パチンと切られたその時
subtitles.english: The moment the umbilical cord was snipped

subtitles.original: 世界と逸れてしまったみたいだ
subtitles.english: It felt as if I’d strayed away from the world

subtitles.original: 眼に映る景色が 悲しく笑うなら
subtitles.english: If the scenery reflected in your eyes is sad

subtitles.original: 恐れず瞼を閉じてごらん
subtitles.english: Don't be afraid, try closing your eyelids

subtitles.original: さあ皆さまこちらへ
subtitles.english: Now, everyone, come this way,

subtitles.original: どうぞ鼓動の鳴る方へ さあ
subtitles.english: please, head towards where the heartbeat sounds

subtitles.original: かかと打ち鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Come, click your heels,

subtitles.original: どうぞ心の躍る方へ さあ
subtitles.english: please, head towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: 蜃気楼に飛び乗って
subtitles.english: Jump onto the mirage,

subtitles.original: さかしまな世界乗りこなして
subtitles.english: and master this upside-down world

subtitles.original: ララライ ララライ 止まない愛を知りたい願う御呪い
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai, an incantation to know love

subtitles.original: 時を超えて朝から夜まで
subtitles.english: Transcending time, from morning until night

subtitles.original: ララライ ララライ
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai,

subtitles.original: 君を知りたい何一つ見逃さぬように
subtitles.english: wanting to know you, so as not to miss a thing

subtitles.original: 時は誰も待ってくれないの
subtitles.english: Time waits for no one

subtitles.original: さあ残酷な運命が
subtitles.english: Come, even if a cruel fate

subtitles.original: 抗えぬ宿命が
subtitles.english: and an irresistible destiny

subtitles.original: 考える間もなく 押し寄せ去るなら
subtitles.english: surge forward before you can even think,

subtitles.original: さあ前が見えなくたって
subtitles.english: come, even if you can't see what's ahead,

subtitles.original: 君を信じてみたいの
subtitles.english: I want to try believing in you

subtitles.original: 恐れずに一歩踏み出したら
subtitles.english: If you take a step forward without fear,

subtitles.original: さあ皆さまこちらへ
subtitles.english: now, everyone, come this way,

subtitles.original: どうぞ鼓動の鳴る方へ さあ
subtitles.english: please, head towards where the heartbeat sounds

subtitles.original: かかと打ち鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Come, click your heels,

subtitles.original: どうぞ心の躍る方へ さあ
subtitles.english: please, head towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: さあ皆さまこちらへ
subtitles.english: Now, everyone, come this way,

subtitles.original: どうぞ鼓動の鳴る方へ さあ
subtitles.english: please, head towards where the heartbeat sounds

subtitles.original: かかと打ち鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Come, click your heels,

subtitles.original: どうぞ心の躍る方へ さあ
subtitles.english: please, head towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: 空飛ぶ鯨に飛び乗って
subtitles.english: Jump onto the flying whale,

subtitles.original: さかしまな世界踊り尽くせ
subtitles.english: dance your fill in this upside-down world

subtitles.original: ララライ ララライ
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai,

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない名も無い今を駆け抜けるの
subtitles.english: running through this nameless present no one knows

subtitles.original: あの三日月に手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reach out your hand toward that crescent moon

subtitles.original: ララライ ララライ
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai,

subtitles.original: 君を知りたい声にならない臆病な朝を
subtitles.english: wanting to know you in this silent, timid morning
